files.patch:
@@ -1,11 +1,15 @@
-*	-text
-*	encoding=utf-8
-*.java	diff=java
-*.c	diff=cpp
-*.h	diff=cpp
-*.cpp	diff=cpp
-*.hpp	diff=cpp
-*.md	diff=markdown
-*.sh	diff=bash
-*.html	diff=html
-*.css	diff=css
+# default: auto-detect text
+*           text=auto
+
+# force C/C++ sources to LF-only and text diffs
+*.cpp       text eol=lf diff=cpp
+*.hpp       text eol=lf diff=cpp
+*.c         text eol=lf diff=cpp
+*.h         text eol=lf diff=cpp
+
+# other languages
+*.java      text diff=java
+*.md        text diff=markdown
+*.sh        text diff=bash
+*.html      text diff=html
+*.css       text diff=css
